## Summary
- For tomorrow's flight:
    - northern moist margin masked by tropical disturbance
    - no precipitating convection except cluster in northern area, east of EarthCare track
- For next flight:
    - southern moist margin still a bit uncertain
    - northern moist margin masked by tropical disturbance 
    - mostly fair conditions with little to no precipitation
    - chance of sampling doldrums
